# f5distributedcloud_api_group (Resource)

Manages an F5 Distributed Cloud API Group. API Groups organize API endpoints for management.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the API Group.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the API Group is created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the API Group.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the API Group.
